title: Bladetongue
summaries: The Bladetongue is a Hardmode autoswinging sword that is obtained by fishing in the Crimson biome. When it strikes an enemy, an ichor stream will be fired at a random angle in front of the player.

The ichor stream deals 70% base damage and knockback (38 base damage and a knockback of 4.025 (Average)), pierces up to 5 enemies / infinitely, and inflicts the Ichor debuff. The ichor stream can bounce on blocks up to 3 times and disappears either on hitting the fourth block or after approximately 2 seconds.
It is the Crimson counterpart to <linked>the Corruption</linked>'s <linked>Toxikarp</linked> and <linked>the Hallow</linked>'s <linked>Crystal Serpent</linked>.

statistics.Tooltip: Spits an Ichor stream on contact
